entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
